title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5004.8 - Directives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5004.8 - Directives

State Regulations
A directive or other written record shall be issued by
the commission for each drawing that details the type, time, place and manner
of drawing; the number and amount of prizes to be awarded, and the procedures
or changes in procedures applicable to that drawing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5004.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
